This technique is a copy of [[Gaara]]'s [[Sand Binding Coffin]] by Nagare, with the difference being rock powder instead of sand. However, Nagare needs to use [[Assimilate All Creation Technique]] before he can use this technique. The powder encloses the opponent and then crushes them, killing them.
